column2: Simon Property Group, featured in today's IBD 50 Stocks To Watch, pays more than triple the market's dividend yield and is close to a buy point. The Indianapolis-based company owns, develops and manages real estate properties such as malls, outlet centers, office space, hotel and residential buildings in 37 U.S. states and Puerto Rico. It also has outlet centers across Asia, Europe and North America.
column4: IBD 50 Stocks To Watch: This Top Dividend Stock Pays More Than Triple The Market's Yield
